acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

addManager(address).details: Only the contract owner can modify manager permissions.

params.manager: The address to add manager status for.

params.tokenConfigs: Array of token configurations including swap and market parameters.

params.desiredLtv: The desired loan-to-value ratio for the position.
params.loanToken: The stablecoin loan token (eg: USDC, DAI, USR, ...).

returns._0: amountToBorrow Amount of loanToken that can be borrowed (scaled to loanToken decimals).

params.loanToken: The stablecoin loan token (eg: USDC, DAI, USR, ...).
params.sharesToBurn: Shares to be burned during unleveraging.

returns._0: amountToBorrow Amount of loanToken needed for flashloan (scaled to loanToken decimals).

params.morphoAddress: Address of the Morpho protocol contract.
params.pendleRouter: Address of the Pendle router for swap execution.

params.amountCollateral: Amount of collateral token to value.

returns._0: Value of collateral amount in loan token (Unscaled to only 18 decimals for standardisation in calculations).

getLiqLtv(address,address).details: This is the maximum LTV before a position becomes liquidatable.

getOrCreateUserProxy(address,uint256).details: Uses the clone factory pattern to create minimal proxy contracts for gas efficiency. This function is permissionless and can be safely called by anyone.

params.desiredLtv: The desired loan-to-value ratio for this proxy.
params.user: The address of the user to get or create a proxy for.

returns.proxy: The address of the user's proxy contract.

getSharesValueInLoanToken(address,addres.details: scaled to 18 decimals for standardisation in calculations

params.collateralToken: Token used as collateral in the position.
The address of the collateral token used in the leverage position.
params.desiredLtv: The desired loan-to-value ratio for the position.
params.loanToken: The address of the token borrowed in the core leverage position.

returns._0: position The user's core leverage position including collateral amount and borrowed shares.
The address of the user's proxy contract, or address(0) if none exists.

isManager(address).details: Uses the s_managers mapping to determine manager status. Managers typically have      elevated permissions for administrative functions.

params.manager: The address to check for manager status

returns._0: bool True if the address is a registered manager, false otherwise

isSupportedCollateralToken(address,addre.details: Validates support by checking if market parameters exist for the token pair.      A non-zero collateralToken address in the market parameters indicates the pair      has been configured and is available for leverage operations.

params.collateralToken: The address of the collateral token to validate
params.loanToken: The address of the loan token to validate

returns._0: bool True if the token pair is supported, false otherwise

params.onBehalfOf: The address of the user for whom the position is being created or modified.
params.params: Struct containing leverage parameters including collateral, loan token, collateral amount, and other swap tokenConfigs.

onMorphoFlashLoan(uint256,bytes).details: Delegates handling to either _handleLeverage or _handleUnleverage based on Action enum.

params.data: Encoded data used to determine action and pass parameters.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Intentionally disabled to retain upgradeability and collateral support management.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner. Setting `newOwner` to the zero address is allowed; this can be used to cancel an initiated ownership transfer.

params.onBehalfOf: The address of the user whose position is being unleveraged.
params.params: Struct containing all parameters required to unwind leverage, including token addresses, shares to burn, collateral withdrawal amount, and swap/limit order data.

LIQUIDATION_BUFFER().notice: Buffer subtracted from liquidation LTV to determine the max LTV (18 decimals)

SLIPPAGE_BUFFER().notice: Maximum allowed change in final LTV after slippage (18 decimals)

addManager(address).notice: Sets manager status for a given address.

addSupportedCollateralTokens((address,by.notice: Allows owner to add support for new collateral tokens.

calcLeverageFlashLoan(uint256,address,ad.notice: Calculates the flashloan amount needed for leveraging based on desired LTV and collateral amount.

calcUnleverageFlashLoan(address,address,.notice: Calculates the flashloan amount needed for unleveraging based on shares to burn.

getCollateralValueInLoanToken(address,ad.notice: Returns the loan token value of a collateral token amount.

getLiqLtv(address,address).notice: Returns the liquidation loan-to-value ratio for a given collateral-loan token pair.

getMaxLtv(address,address).notice: Returns the max loan-to-value ratio after applying the liquidation buffer.

getOrCreateUserProxy(address,uint256).notice: Gets an existing user proxy or creates a new one for the specified user and desired LTV.

getSharesValueInLoanToken(address,addres.notice: Calculates the amount of loan token needed to repay borrowed shares.

getUserCoreLeveragePosition(address,uint.notice: Returns the core leverage position of a user for a given collateral and loan token pair.

getUserProxy(address,uint256).notice: Returns the proxy contract address for a specific user and desired LTV.

isManager(address).notice: Checks if an address has manager privileges

isSupportedCollateralToken(address,addre.notice: Checks if a collateral-loan token pair is supported for leverage operations

leverage(address,(uint256,address,addres.notice: Creates/Modifies leveraged positions by supplying stable PT-collateral and borrowing stablecoins via flashloan.

recoveryMode().notice: Flag to enable user direct control of their proxies

renounceOwnership().notice: Overrides renounceOwnership to prevent ownership renunciation.

s_userProxies(address,uint256).notice: Mapping from user => desiredLtv => proxy contract

unleverage(address,(uint256,address,addr.notice: Closes or reduces an existing leveraged position and returns the remaining amount (in loan token) to the user.
